TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ConstructorArgumentAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ConstructorArgumentAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ConstructorArgumentAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定可以使用非默认构造函数语法来初始化对象，而且由指定名称的属性提供构造信息。

span.span: Specifies that an object can be initialized by using a non-default constructor syntax, and that a property of the specified name supplies construction information.

summary.span: 此信息主要用于 XAML 序列化。

span.span: This information is primarily for XAML serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指定关联的属性初始化由构造函数参数，以及如果使用构造函数构造实例，则在 XAML 序列化时应忽略。This attribute specifies that the associated property can be initialized by a constructor parameter and should be ignored for XAML serialization if the constructor is used to construct the instance. 这样可以更好的往返过程表示形式进行参数化构造函数语法而不是默认构造函数实例化以及特定的属性。This provides better round trip representations for parameterized constructor syntax rather than default constructor instantiation plus specific attributes. 一种框架可能支持保留标记扩展用法并将其重建而不是依赖于`ProvideValue`序列化的对象树中的输出。A framework can potentially support preserving markup extension usages and reconstituting them rather than relying on `ProvideValue` output in the object tree for serialization. 在这种情况下，信息用于生成典型的标记扩展用法的准确表示序列化期间很有用。In this case, the information is useful during serialization for producing an accurate representation of the typical markup extension usage. 有关标记扩展的详细信息，请参阅[Markup Extensions for XAML Overview](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md)。For more information about markup extensions, see [Markup Extensions for XAML Overview](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/markup-extensions-for-xaml-overview.md). 若要对有效归属，一种类型的公共非默认构造函数必须支持只有一个参数。In order to be valid for a attribution, a type's public non-default constructor must support exactly one parameter. 参数的名称必须对应于读/写属性。The name of the parameter must correspond to a read/write property. 该属性必须是否则可序列化。The property must be otherwise serializable. 此属性用于创建在构造函数参数的名称和属性之间的对应关系。You use this attribute to create the correspondence between the name of the parameter in the constructor, and the property. 具体而言，将此特性应用于连接的读/写属性的属性级定义。Specifically, you apply this attribute to the property-level definition of the connecting read/write property. 使用者情况下可能会引发其中未解析为类型支持，或当应用于不具有适当构造参数和实参的类型。Consumers of may throw in cases where does not resolve to type backing, or when applied to a type that does not have the appropriate construction arguments and arity. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类存在于 WindowsBase 的特定于 WPF 程序集。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在中[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes 有关标记扩展和 WPF 的详细信息，请参阅[标记扩展和 WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md)。For more information about markup extensions and WPF, see [Markup Extensions and WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/markup-extensions-and-wpf-xaml.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string argumentName) cil managed

param.name: argumentName
param.span: 将初始化关联属性的构造函数的名称。

span.span: The name of the constructor that will initialize the associated property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ArgumentName As String
public: property System::String ^ ArgumentName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取将初始化关联的属性的构造函数的 name 参数。

span.span: Gets the name parameter of the constructor that will initialize the associated property.

value.span: 假定具有 CLR 支持，那么这对应于相关构造函数参数的 。

span.span: Assuming CLR backing, this corresponds to the of the relevant constructor parameter.
